welcome_message_template.name: welcome_message_template
welcome_message_template.default:
'[NEMS] Welcome to Nexlinx Employee Management System! 🎉

To join our system, please reply with "/join" to continue the registration process.

This is an automated system for employee onboarding only.'

join_confirmation_template.name: join_confirmation_template
join_confirmation_template.default:
'[NEMS] Thank you for joining! 📝

To verify your identity, please provide any 6 digits from your CNIC (National ID Card).

Example: If your CNIC is 12345-1234567-1, you can reply with "123451" or "456712" etc.

This helps us verify you are an authorized employee.'

cnic_verification_success_template.name: cnic_verification_success_template

cnic_verification_fail_template.name: cnic_verification_fail_template
cnic_verification_fail_template.default:
'[NEMS] Verification Failed ❌

The CNIC digits provided do not match our employee records. Please try again with different 6 digits from your CNIC.

Attempts remaining: {remaining_attempts}'

apk_message_template.name: apk_message_template
